short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XCensor allows you to seamlessly censor posts on X by automatically blocking content containing specific keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to unwanted content on X! Whether you're dodging movie spoilers, steering clear of political debates, or avoiding sensitive topics, XCensor has got you covered. 

With just a few clicks, you can block posts containing keywords you don't want to see. It's super simple, incredibly easy to use, and designed to keep your feed exactly the way you want it. 

Take control of your online experience and enjoy a cleaner, more focused scroll with XCensor!
